title: How Generative AI is Transforming Product Roadmaps: A 2025 Guide
description: Learn how generative AI tools like Gemini and roadmap.sh revolutionize product roadmapping in 2025. Atiq Israk shares strategies from his AssetIQ project, achieving 30% faster deployment cycles in Bangladesh.

author.name: Atiq Israk
author.bio: Generative AI Product Manager at Ether Technologies | Built NAVBOT & MAVE CMS AI integrations | Driving 160% revenue growth through AI in SaaS & FinTech | Dhaka, Bangladesh

content.introduction: Product roadmapping is evolving with generative AI. Tools like Gemini and roadmap.sh streamline planning, prioritization, and stakeholder alignment. In my AssetIQ project, AI cut deployment cycles by 30%. This guide explores how AI transforms roadmaps for PMs in 2025, with a focus on emerging markets.

sections.heading: The Role of AI in Modern Roadmapping
sections.body: AI enhances roadmaps by automating prioritization and predicting trends. My work on AssetIQ used Gemini to forecast user needs, saving weeks. Here’s how AI reshapes the process...

items: Automation: Generate milestones with AI tools.
Insights: Use Perplexity for trend analysis.
Alignment: Visualize plans with roadmap.sh for stakeholders.

sections.heading: Step-by-Step AI Roadmapping Process
sections.body: Follow this process, inspired by my MAVE CMS and AssetIQ projects, to build AI-powered roadmaps.

items: Step 1: Use Perplexity to research market trends.
Step 2: Draft milestones with Gemini prompts.
Step 3: Visualize with roadmap.sh for clarity.

faqs.question: How does AI improve roadmap efficiency?
